account_data_map.strategic_priority_summary: The company is focused on driving efficiencies, getting to peer benchmark levels across the P&L, and expanding margins over time. They are also working to strengthen leadership and capabilities, optimize spend, and drive higher ROI on brand investments.
account_data_map.risk_summary:
• * Supply chain disruptions and logistics challenges: input cost inflation, unfavorable mix, currency, and strategic price investments
• * Economic pressures and inflation: decline in seasonal incidences, inventory build in China
• * Competitive dynamics and market shifts: competitive pressures in women's health in Asia-Pacific, losing share in mouthwash business in the US
